Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities We are urgently hiring for a Node/React/MySQL/Laravel Developer. We are looking for a Node/React/MySQL/Laravel Developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required. Desired Candidate Profile Node/React/MySQL/Laravel DeveloperMin 2 Years Experience requiredPerks and Benefits Salary based on experience and performance.
